title: 759: BITCOIN TO REACH $500K IN EARLY 2022, SAYS PLAN B!! CRYPTO WILL RISE 100X AS FIAT CURRENCY CRUMBLES!
description:
Popular cryptocurrency analyst and the author of the Bitcoin Stock-to-Flow model, Plan B expects the BTC price to reach $500,000 at the beginning of next year.

Plan B believes that the Bitcoin price will be increasing for another 3 to 6 months and predicts by the end of November, BTC will rise above $98,000 and in December, it's on track to overcome the $135,000 mark.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
